title: Looking for fonts similar to this old block imperfect "Harmed"
content:
I know this is hand lettered and a bad attempt at it, question is what current typeface is similar but more perfected and ’rounded’ off.

Thanks in advance.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071225134503im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Harmed_4576.jpg)

 [‹ (x) Lula Mag display face - Kursivschrift {Michael A}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071225134503/http:/typophile.com/node/40310 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) ArtBin logo - Helvetica (customized) {Marc O} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071225134503/http:/typophile.com/node/40314 "Go to next forum topic")
author: BlueEyedPeas

comments.content: The one that readily comes to mind is [Metropolitaines](http://web.archive.org/web/20071225134503/http:/www.linotype.com/89980/metropolitaines-family.html)

James Arboghast’s Jellybrush might work

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/sentinel/jellybrush/](http://web.archive.org/web/20071225134503/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sentinel/jellybrush/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/sentinel/jellybrush/")

ChrisL
